description: Top executive responsible for overall strategy and results.

description: Executive leading technology strategy and engineering.

description: Executive managing enterprise IT and information systems.

description: Executive responsible for product vision and delivery.

description: Executive leading marketing strategy and brand.

description: Standardized measure of staffing capacity (e.g., 1.0 = full time).

description: Measurable metric to track performance against goals.

description: Metric to evaluate if objectives are being met.

description: Metric tracking how work is performed.

description: Total demand for a product if fully captured.

description: Contracted recurring revenue normalized to a year.
example: Review ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue) targets in the monthly finance meeting.
Review MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Revenue retained including expansions minus churn.
example: Review NRR (Net Revenue Retention) targets in the monthly finance meeting.
Review GRR (Gross Revenue Retention) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Revenue value of a single annualized contract.
example: Review ACV (Annual Contract Value) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Total revenue over the full term of a contract.
example: Review TCV (Total Contract Value) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Revenue per account or user in a period.
example: Review ARPU (Average Revenue Per User) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Revenue per account in a period.
example: Review ARPA (Average Revenue Per Account) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Total gross profit expected over a customer’s lifetime.

description: Total cost to acquire a new customer.
example: Review CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Efficiency ratio comparing value vs. acquisition cost.
example: Review LTV:CAC (Lifetime Value to CAC) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Revenue minus cost of goods, as a percentage of revenue.
example: Review GM (Gross Margin) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Operating income as a percentage of revenue.
example: Review OM (Operating Margin) targets in the monthly finance meeting.

description: Valuation method based on discounted future cash flows.

description: Blended cost of equity and debt financing.

description: Discount rate that sets NPV to zero.

description: Present value of cash flows minus initial investment.

description: Direct costs to produce delivered goods/services.

description: Ongoing costs for running the business (SG&A, R&D).
